name: US Army 6x6 Off-Road: Truck Driving Simulator Game
name_original: US Army 6x6 Off-Road: Truck Driving Simulator Game
description:
Get ready to play newest 6x6 truck driving game over off-road terrain like never before. Roll your eight tyre centipede vehicle in slippery mud. Be army truck driver and fulfill duty on the hilly environment as true patriotic soldier. Driver gigantic military truck over bumpy, sloppy and rigid terrain with twist and turns of countryside. 6x6 truck driving is not easy job for any armature civilians over inclined mountains. Clear the rigorous tracks for army convoy transport weapons and medical cargo to the army base camp over up hill location.


Features:
Insane game play with intense 10 army truck driving missions.
Intuitive detail control for detecting land mines and placing military base camps.
Open world environment with offroad uphill environment.
Power steering for smooth driving experience for 6x6 trucker.
Engaging background music with high detail graphics.


Download this army truck simulator right now & give us feedback so that we can make more fun games for you.
